articles.title: 'Hold my beer': Australian surfer Mikey Wright charges into Hawaii surf to rescue struggling swimmer - The Guardian
articles.description: Wright himself was filming the incident, then jumped a fence, dived into the water and pulled the woman to safety
articles.content:
An Australian pro surfer who stepped in to rescue a woman being swept away by strong currents in Hawaii says he did not stop to consider his own safety because he just knew that she needed help.
